item.description:
What: Ladies Night at Chunky's Nashua NH

When: Wednesday, May 19, 2010 6:30 PM

Where:
Chunky's Cinema Pub
151 Coliseum Ave
Nashua, NH 03063
603-880-8055

"Letters to Juliet" is now playing at Chunkys Cinema in Nashua NH, so gals Wednesday is a great night to meetup for what i hear is a great chick flick, Wednesday is Chunky's Ladies Night when Ladies get $2.00 off admission.

Movie starts at 7:15pm,
Admission cost is only $5.25 for Ladies

Meet at Chunky's Cinema Nashua NH, conveniently located off exit 6 (route 3)
at the box office at 6:30pm for dinner & the movie,
or by 7:15pm inside theatre at table with meetup sign.

Yes Men you are welcome to join, but unless you wear a wig and skirt your admission is $7.25.

Letters to Juliet (PG ) 1Hr 45Min
plot - "An American girl on vacation in Italy finds an unanswered "letter to Juliet" -- one of thousands of missives left at the fictional lover's Verona courtyard, which are typically answered by a the "secretaries of Juliet" -- and she goes on a quest to find the lovers referenced in the letter. "

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Ladies night at Chunky's in Nashua :)
